data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My little brother is a very happy little baby. He ____ in ____ city ____ my ____, ____ he ____ one ____ old. He ____ big ____ eyes ____ the ____ nose. He never cries, and is always playing.
data.partBlankContent: My little brother is a very happy little baby. He li___ in t__ city wi__ my m__, a__ he i_ one ye__ old. He h__ big bl__ eyes a__ the cut___ nose. He never cries, and is always playing.
data.fullContent: My little brother is a very happy little baby. He lives in the city with my mom, and he is one year old. He has big blue eyes and the cutest nose. He never cries, and is always playing.
data.answer: 我的小弟弟是一个非常快乐的小宝贝。他和我妈妈住在城市里，他一岁了。他有蓝色的大眼睛和最可爱的鼻子。他从不哭，总是在玩。
